Turn your creative
feedback into income

Back n Forth is a platform that enables creators to give feedback on their audience’s work. Let your audience submit their work to you, provide feedback, and get compensated for your time.

Get Started

The easiest way to get paid for sharing your area of expertise

Designed to be as flexible for creators as possible. Back n Forth handles audience submissions, payments, and provides the tools you'll need to give feedback asynchronously. No meetings, no schedule – focus on what you do best and we'll handle the rest.

How does it work?

Create an engagement

Let your audience know what kind of feedback you're able to provide and what they should submit. We'll help you create a dedicated page so your audience can effortlessly upload their work for your review.

Share it with your audience

Let your audience know about your engagement by sharing it on social media or directly with them. We provide quick share options so can maximize outreach.

Respond to submissions

Provide feedback by typing comments and drawing directly on the submission. You have 7 days to complete the submission so you can respond whenever is most convenient for you.

Key features

Flexibility

Respond to audience submissions from anywhere, on any device

Limit the submissions you'll accept at one time to earn on your terms

Share your feedback by leaving a comment or drawing on the submission

Intimacy

Offer one-on-one support that is more convenient and less intimidating

Connect with your audience deeper and be apart of their individual growth

Better understand who your supporters are and what they're looking for

Support

Diversify your income and provide an experience worth paying for

Offer an affordable option of tailored education to your audience

We're here to support both you and your audience along the way

Frequently asked questions

Who should use Back n Forth and is it right choice for my audience?

Back n Forth is an ideal tool for any creator who wants to earn additional income by providing educational feedback on their audience’s work.

Do I need an existing audience to start using Back n Forth?

While this is not required, we recommend it. But, this could change in the future as we find ways to help creators build their audience.

Do I need to be a resident of North America to sign up?

Yes, we currently only support residents of North America. If you live somewhere else, follow us on social media to be notified when we support your region.

How much will it cost for me to start using Back n Forth?

There are no monthly costs to use Back n Forth. We charge a 20% fee on submission payments, which you can consider when pricing your engagements.

How do I accept payments and how often will I get paid?

We process all payments through Stripe, a globally trusted leader in payment security. You'll be paid weekly for all completed submissions.

Ready to start earning?

Create your account in just a few minutes and start giving your audience feedback
